title: Jory
data:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Jory the Bloodstained Count''' is a [[unique]] [[vampire (monster)|vampire]] capable of mesmerizing you like a [[siren]] or staking you with [[Lehudib's Crystal Spear]] for massive damage. When he dies, he leaves an unusually large spray of blood instead of a [[corpse]].

{{monster spells}}

==Location==
*[[The Depths]]:3-4
*[[The Vaults]]:2-5
*[[The Crypt]]
*A particular vault in [[Tartarus]]

==Tips & Tricks==
*Depending on his weapon, Jory can hit harder than a [[stone giant]] in melee, and getting mesmerized will make escape significantly more difficult, but neither of these are as great a concern as Lehudib's Crystal Spear. High [[EV]] and [[SH]] will greatly reduce the chance of him landing this spell, even more so if you've got [[Repel Missiles#Player sources|Repel Missiles]] active. Considering that he's fairly durable, preparing yourself to deal with the possibility of multiple LCS's is a good idea.
*High [[willpower]] will give you a good chance of resisting his attempts to mesmerize you. [[Clarity]] will grant immunity.
*Jory is vulnerable to [[silence]]. If you're a competent physical fighter, you can read a [[scroll of silence]] and then smash him in melee. A weapon of [[holy wrath]] will make this even easier.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.13]], he would only spawn in one extremely rare [[vault]] where his entourage of [[silent spectre]]s would render his spells useless.
*Prior to [[0.12]], he had significantly less HP.
*Jory was added in [[0.8]].
